resources.string: Location permission is required for this demo.
Access to the location service is required to demonstrate the \'my location\' feature, which shows your current location on the map.

Appraisal requires location permission to get your location. \nPlease try again and grant access to use the location.\nIf the permission has been permanently denied, it can be enabled from the System Settings > Apps > \'Appraisal\'.
By clicking "Accept" you agree to share your trial geolocation with Appraisal
